lenderProfiles.bestFeatures1: Funds commercial bridge loans between $250k and $7.5m
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: They offer specialized loan programs for interest-only commercial bridge loans, fix & flips, investment property LOC and whole loan acquisitions

description.html:
Stormfield Capital Funding is a private investment firm specializing in bridge loans for residential and commercial investment real estate properties.

We are direct private money lenders and therefore are able to help borrowers in tough situations including, quick closing acquisition, fix and flip loans, foreclosure avoidance and discounted debt repurchases

Our vast experience combined with our well funded capital pool allows us to work with both borrowers and brokers to fund deals in a safe, secure and efficient manner.

No owner occupied properties

No ground-up construction

No land

metaDescription.html:
Stormfield Capital Funding is a direct commercial bridge lender that specializes in bridge loans for commercial and residential real estate investors all across the East Coast.

They provide private money loans from $250k to $7.5mil to real estate investors and developers on fix & flips, commercial bridge loans, investment property line of credit and whole loan acquisitions.

They primarily focus on the value of the underlying real estate collateral when originating a loan.
metaDescription.text:
Stormfield Capital Funding is a direct commercial bridge lender that specializes in bridge loans for commercial and residential real estate investors all across the East Coast.

They provide private money loans from $250k to $7.5mil to real estate investors and developers on fix & flips, commercial bridge loans, investment property line of credit and whole loan acquisitions.

They primarily focus on the value of the underlying real estate collateral when originating a loan.

lenderProfiles.name: Stormfield Capital Funding

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures1: Fast approval within 24 to 48 hours, average closing within 7 to 12 days
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: There are no penalties for paying off or partially amortizing the debt at any time
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: All borrowers welcome including ones with no credit history, new businesses and foreign nationals

description.html:
RBI Mortgages is a direct hard money lender in New York, Florida and Texas for residential properties only.

We have funded hundreds of deals since our inception in 2015, with a focus on single family homes, condos and multi-family complexes (2-4 units).

Submit your loan proposal to us and we will get back to you within 48 hours to see if we can fund your deal.

No owner occupied properties

No ground-up construction

No land

metaDescription.html:
RBI Mortgages are hard money lenders located in Florida and have a variety of loan programs including residential and commercial bridge loans and funds loans from $75k to $5mil.

They offer competitive rates and no pre-payment penalties on many different property types including single-family residences and multi-family apartment buildings. They also fund loans in Texas and New York.

They also fund loans in Texas and New York.

lenderProfiles.name: RBI Mortgages

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Provides loans for a variety of purposes, including fix & flip, new construction, refinance and purchase

description.html:
Peak Asset Lending is a direct private money lender for residential properties in 25 states across The USA.

With over $150 million in loans closed since our inception, we strive to provide our clients with swift and efficient funding for their real estate needs.

Since we are direct lenders that makes us the final decision makers when it comes to financing your loan.

Our loan types include purchase, refinance, cash out, fix and flip and ground-up construction.

No loans for owner occupied properties.

metaDescription.html:
Peak Asset Lending is a direct bridge lender out of Kansas, they lend on residential properties in 25 states across America.

They provide asset-based loan's from $25k to $1mil and they only lend on non-owner occupied real estate investment properties.

They provide loans on purchases, refinances, rehabs, rehab to perms, new construction and cash-out refinances.
metaDescription.text:

They provide loans on purchases, refinances, rehabs, rehab to perms, new construction and cash-out refinances.

lenderProfiles.name: Peak Asset Lending

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures1: Commercial hard money loans from $2 million to $30 million dollars
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: They work with business owners and real estate operators, who are under-served by traditional financial institutions
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Personal guarantee, non-recourse, subject to bad-boy events

description.html:
iBorrow is a nationwide direct commercial bridge lender based out of Los Angeles, California.

Our loans are non-recourse and we primarily focus is on the value of the underlying asset rather than a borrowers credit score or income.

With our loan program we can fund deals from $2 million up to $40 million on all commercial and industrial properties in major cities across The USA.

No loans for land

No loans for ground-up construction

metaDescription.html:
iBorrow is a nationwide lender that provides bridge loans on all commercial real estate property types to borrowers who are looking for a fast, flexible and reliable financing option.

They offer individually structured bridge lending solutions for borrowers of all commercial property types from $2 million to $30 million, across the United States.

They are a non-recourse lender, other than for bad-boy and certain other qualifying events.
metaDescription.text:
iBorrow is a nationwide lender that provides bridge loans on all commercial real estate property types to borrowers who are looking for a fast, flexible and reliable financing option. 

They offer individually structured bridge lending solutions for borrowers of all commercial property types from $2 million to $30 million, across the United States. 

They are a non-recourse lender, other than for bad-boy and certain other qualifying events.

lenderProfiles.name: iBorrow

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures1: Loan pre-approval within 24 hours and can close in as few as 3 days
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: 12-month, interest-only bridge financing for fix & flips, new construction and cash-out or refinances
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Direct, local East Coast lender that has funded over 1,500+ fix & flip loans

description.html:
Asset Based Lending, LLC is your top choice hard money lender on The East Coast.

Since 2010, we have been funding residential and commercial real estate loans from $75k to $2 million in as little as 2 days.

Our team is comprised of knowledgeable and experienced real estate lenders here to help you get your project funded in a fast and efficient manner.

metaDescription.html:
Asset Based Lending is an East Coast hard money lender located in New Jersey. They have a variety of tailor made loan programs including fix and flip, new construction, cash out refinances and rental property loans for non-owner occupied properties.

They fund 12 month term deals from $75k to $2mil and have a loan to value ratio of 70% to 85% depending on the loan program.
metaDescription.text: Asset Based Lending is an East Coast hard money lender located in New Jersey. They have a variety of tailor made loan programs including fix and flip, new construction, cash out refinances and rental property loans for non-owner occupied properties.\n\nThey fund 12 month term deals from $75k to $2mil and have a loan to value ratio of 70% to 85% depending on the loan program.

lenderProfiles.name: Asset Based Lending, LLC

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: 6.90% to 7.90% (interest only), on acquisition, refinance and cash-out

description.html:
With offices in Los Angeles and San Francisco, Loan Oak is a direct bridge lender for California investment properties since 2003.

Our loans are non-recourse and we offer some of the most competitive rates in the industry, with loans from $1 million up to $25 million available.

We lend in first position for all commercial and residential non-owner occupied properties.

Over $6 billion funded

Over $1 billion in capital

LTV up to 60%

Rates start at 5.9%

No prepayment penalty

No 3rd party appraisal required

metaDescription.html:
Lone Oak is a California direct bridge lender, with over $1 billion in capital under management they have funded over $6 billion dollars in deals.

They typically deliver bridge loans on multi-family, industrial, office, retail, mixed-use, and non-owner occupied residential real estate.

description.html:
Over the past two decades, The Norris Group has been funding residential non-owner occupied real estate projects for investors.

We offer loans on fix and flips, purchases and new construction in both the California and Florida markets.

Our base rate starts at 6.9% depending on the location of the property, financial strength of the borrower and borrower's experience.

No land

No owner occupied

metaDescription.html:
The Norris Group has been part of the California real estate investor community for over 20 years. 

They offer hard money loans across California and Florida starting at 6.9%.

Their loan programs range from standard fix & flips, buy and holds, to rentals and new construction.

description.html:
Since inception, Socotra Capital has funded over 600 private money loans across California.

Our fund is well capitalized with over $200 million under management and is capable of funding short term loans from $100,000 to $12 million.

We welcome loans for fix and flips. purchases, refinance, bridge financing and ground-up construction.

We underwrite all loans in-house and are therefore able to give borrowers unparalleled knowledge and speed when it comes to your loan.

Loans can be closed in 10-15 days, upon all documents being received.

metaDescription.html:
Socotra Capital has over $200 million in assets under management and are a direct lender that manages and funds all of their loans in-house.

Their asset based loans range from $100k to $12mil, and they lend on a variety of loan types including fix & flips, refinance, purchases, bridge and ground-up construction.
metaDescription.text: Socotra Capital has over $200 million in assets under management and are a direct lender that manages and funds all of their loans in-house.\n\nTheir asset based loans range from $100k to $12mil, and they lend on a variety of loan types including fix & flips, refinance, purchases, bridge and ground-up construction.

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Funds commercial, construction and residential projects

description.html:
For over three decades, Seattle Funding Group has been providing private money real estate loans across 11 states in the western United States.

Having funded over $1 billion in bridge loans, we have control of hundreds of millions of dollars in capital designated for commercial and residential real estate investors.

We offer rapid funding to our clients and can perform when other banking options are not available to a borrower.

Our stellar performance and vast understanding of short term bridge loans makes us the perfect company to fund your next real estate project.

metaDescription.html:
Seattle Funding Group is a proven West Coast based hard money lender with over 30 years experience and $1 billion in funded deals.

They provide a variety of specialized loan programs for construction, commercial and residential properties.

Their borrowers are a diverse group of Individuals, corporations, LLCs, partnerships, trusts, estates, international investors.

description.html:
Yieldi offers hard money loans on both commercial and residential real estate properties in over 40 states across the USA.

Rates range from 10-14% and can be closed in as quickly as 5 days. Loans up to $5 million are possible.

As direct lenders, our fund is highly capitalized and capable of numerous loan types including, multi-family, buy and hold, cash-out, fix and flip, bridge lending and construction loans.

Loans for owner occupied properties are not available.

metaDescription.html:
Yieldi is a hard money lender located in Atlanta, Georgia lending locally and across 38 other states.

They fund real estate investments backed by real property such as a commercial or residential property.

They have a variety of different loan programs including mutli-family, bridge, construction, cannabis grow, note purchasing and even secure business advances.

lenderProfiles.name: Yieldi

description.html:
Coventus Holding Corp. is a direct private money lender for both residential and commercial real estate investors.

Since 2015, we have funded over $1 billion in private money loans in over 20 states across America.

Our competitive pricing structure with rates starting at 4.99% and superior customer service has made us one of the top hard money lenders in the industry.

Financing can be acquired in as little as 5 days and investors are able to borrow against one property or multiple properties.

We do not lend on land, ground-up construction or owner-occupied homes.

metaDescription.html:
Conventus provides business purpose loans for the purchase, renovation and rental of single and multi-family residential real estate.

They are a direct private money lender in over 20 states across America and have funded over $1 billion funded since inception.
metaDescription.text:
Conventus provides business purpose loans for the purchase, renovation and rental of single and multi-family residential real estate.

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures1: A simple & expedited pre-qualification process can be done in 10 minutes or less
lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: They fund a variety of loans sizes and projects

description.html:
With over 30 year experience, EquityMax has been funding hard money loans throughout the U.S. to both new and experienced real estate investors.

Our low rates, high LTV and ability to close quickly (2-3 days) makes us a favorite amongst borrowers.

Other benefit to using our services include;

  • No minimum Fico score
  • Few documents required (no tax returns, no prepayment penalty, no bank statements, no application fee and no appraisals)
  • Direct lender, lending our own moneyNo loans on:

No loans on:

  • Ground-up construction
  • Owner-occupied homes
  • Land

metaDescription.html:
EquityMax Financial is family owned and operated giving you direct access to decision makers when you apply for a loan. They are a nationwide direct hard money lender with 30 years of experience.

They have flexible loan offerings, no minimum FICO score and opt for broker price opinions (BPOs) over formal appraisals.

description.html:
Civic Financial Services is a direct private money lender, working exclusively with real estate investors to fund non-owner occupied residential investment properties.

We are well capitalized through our Wall Street partners and with our direct access to capital will work to the best of our ability to fund your deal as quickly as possible.

Since 2014 we have funded over $2.5 billion in residential real estate loans and with over 200 employees we are positioned to increase our number of deals funded every year.

Our goal is to assist first-time and experienced borrowers with easy and efficient short term financing solutions for their real estate projects.

metaDescription.html:
Civic Financial Services is a direct private money lender, working exclusively with real estate investors to fund non-owner occupied residential investment properties.

Since 2014 they've funded over $2.5 billion in residential real estate loans and have over 200 employees.

They have specialized loan programs for bridge, fix & flip, rental, refinance and mutli-family and lend to both experience investors and first timers.

description.html:
Pacific Private Money specializes in direct private hard money loans for real estate investors and borrowers across California and select states. 

As a direct private lender (not a broker), they have extensive capital to lend, offering quick turnaround and courteous, personalized service. 

With over 21 years of experience in real estate lending, they can guide you through the entire hard money lending process with confidence.

Since they underwrite and fund their own loans, they can close fast and provide a quick turnaround of any loan requests often getting back to people within a day, (or even hours).

They work with active real estate investors and borrowers with equity in existing commercial and residential properties.

metaDescription.html:
Pacific Private Money offers best-in-class alternative financing solutions for real estate transactions across California with a special emphasis on Northern California.

They also fund other select states when the loan amount is more than $2mil.

Their funding comes from a combination of their own and investors private capital, and will generally get back to you within the day, if not the hour.
metaDescription.text:
Pacific Private Money offers best-in-class alternative financing solutions for real estate transactions across California with a special emphasis on Northern California.

They also fund other select states when the loan amount is more than $2mil.

Their funding comes from a combination of their own and investors private capital, and will generally get back to you within the day, if not the hour.

description.html:
We have been providing trusted funding solutions for over 35 years. Our rates start at 9.9% with 2 points and a $500,000 minimum.

The principals at Commercial Private Equity have over 75 years combined experience in the hard money, bridge loan marketplace.

No deal that makes sense is beyond our abilities. We specialize in raw land, development, construction and bridge loans for non-owner occupied commercial properties. 

We have participated nationwide in funding opportunities ranging from major motion pictures to working gold mines in Utah.

Do you want a funding source with integrity, dedication and speed? 

That is exactly what you get when you choose Commercial Private Equity. 

We can evaluate your transaction in 24 hours or less and, once we receive your relevant information, we can close within days and not weeks.

metaDescription.html:
Commercial Private Equity is a direct asset based lender operating out of Atlanta, Georgia. They make nationwide loans on anything from gold mines to equipment and fund many commercial deals.

The have a diverse set of loan programs including commercial hard money, construction, bridge, raw land and workout loans.
metaDescription.text:
Commercial Private Equity is a direct asset based lender operating out of Atlanta, Georgia. They make nationwide loans on anything from gold mines to equipment and fund many commercial deals.

The have a diverse set of loan programs including commercial hard money, construction, bridge, raw land and workout loans.

description.html:
Straightline was founded in 2006 with the goal of becoming a premier provider of loans for real estate investors.

Our simple approach has always been to provide fast answers, great service, and reliable funding for our clients.

Since 2006 we have provided millions of dollars in loans to local real estate investors who have improved properties, stabilized neighborhoods, created jobs, and built wealth.

Our loan products include:

  • Rehab Loans up to 90% of purchase and 100% of renovations
  • Simple Bridge Loans up to 85% of purchase
  • 30 year fixed rate rental loans up to 80% LTV
  • 100% Transactional Funding for Wholesalers
  • Multifamily Lending coming soon!

metaDescription.html:
Straightline is a hard money lender located in North Carolina and provides loans on single and muli-family properties.

They have a straight forward application process that requires very little documentation and provide both short and long term lending options. Their loan menu includes rehab loans, simple bridge loans, 30 year landlord loans and transactional funding.
metaDescription.text:
Straightline is a hard money lender located in North Carolina and provides loans on single and muli-family properties. 

They have a straight forward application process that requires very little documentation and provide both short and long term lending options.  

Their loan menu includes rehab loans, simple bridge loans, 30 year landlord loans and transactional funding.

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures2: Not bound by certain fund parameters

description.html:
Our approach to private money lending in Seattle, and the Northwest, is to only fund loans that will result in all parties being successful. At Juniper Capital, we care whether our borrower is going to be successful or not – that’s the Juniper difference.

Through this client-centric approach, we have become an industry leader for alternative financing and hard money lending throughout the Pacific Northwest and beyond.

At Juniper, we have built great opportunities for our borrowers by creating win-win private money loans that allow all parties involved to both meet and exceed their needs. We simply don’t fund a loan unless we believe all parties will be successful. As a private lender, we have the ability to be flexible and creative when structuring loan proposals, as well as equity partnerships to take your project from concept to reality.

metaDescription.html:
Juniper Capital is a hard money lender located in Seattle, Washington and fund residential, commercial and land deals primarily around the Pacific Northwest.

They provide private real estate financing for commercial properties, multi-family residential, investment residential properties, fix and flip projects, land, and construction.
metaDescription.text: Juniper Capital is a hard money lender located in Seattle, Washington and fund residential, commercial and land deals primarily around the Pacific Northwest.\n\nThey provide private real estate financing for commercial properties, multi-family residential, investment residential properties, fix and flip projects, land, and construction.

description.html:
Merchants Mortgage is a private real estate lender headquartered in Greenwood Village, Colorado with affiliate offices and lending partners in various other locations.

The company operates with speed and predictability to meet the needs of its customers.

MMTC specializes in short term residential bridge loans for investors, commercial loans, construction loans, and rental property loans.

Merchants Mortgage offers logical loan structures and underwriting to meet the timing and transaction needs of the market.

Merchants Mortgage Loan Servicing, Construction Draw Management and its operational platform provide institutional level support and services to its customers.

Most of their loans have no pre-payment penalties and are interest-only, perfect for investors.

metaDescription.html: Merchants Mortgage is a private real estate lender headquartered in Greenwood Village, Colorado with affiliate offices and lending partners in various other locations. They work with a diverse range of clients from 1st time borrowers looking to buy their fist investment property to seasoned investors who own hundreds of properties. They fund fix and flip, ground-up construction, 30 year rentals and commercial property loans.

description.html:
We are committed to helping you get your deal done with a fast, simple process that gets you the funding you need to create a successful real estate project. 

For the last decade, we have been Arizona’s fastest, most reliable private-money lender because we are responsive, innovative, experienced, service-oriented, and we do it right the first time, and we are bringing that to the Colorado and Texas markets. 

Once you work with one of our private money loan experts, you will see why thousands of real estate investors have put their trust in us for all their future deals.

A key part of our formula is the dedicated team we have put together. 

Combined, we have over 100 years of real estate, investing, and lending experience. 

Our team is geared up to see the value investors are looking to add to a residential or commercial property. 

Every day, we see the impressive value extraction our borrowers are able to execute by bringing a fully renovated asset to market.

metaDescription.html:
Capital Fund I has been operating in Arizona for the last 10 years and provides loans for commercial, construction, land, single family residences and fix & flips.

Their loans have a 6 month to 12 month term with low fees and a 75% loan to value ratio.

They also serve the Texas and Colorado markets.

description.html:
Newmark Investment and Loan is a Nevada based private money Lender. Newmark has inhouse underwriting with the ability to make quick decisions.

Newmark's Broker has been a hard Money borrower and understands the borrower's side of the transaction as well as the lender's objectives.

Have a deal or working on a deal? Run it past Newmark for thoughts and ideas on how to structure the deal that best suits.

If the deal makes sense, the deal is approved.

Pre-qualification letters can be provided after a conversation and understanding of the transaction.

Newmark lends anywhere in the State of Nevada including rural counties.

metaDescription.html:
Newmark Investment and Loan is a local hard money lender located in Sparks, Nevada.

They provide commercial loans, residential loans and construction loans to real estate investors and have many specialized products including: construction loans, equity loans, rehab loans, bad credit home equity loans and vacant land loans.

description.html:
COHI Capital has a strong, tenured reputation for fast funding and client-focused service. 

We have been funding private money real estate loans for more than a decade. 

We specialize in properties located along the Front Range, up the I-70 corridor, in mountain and ski towns and select other states.

At COHI, we know that hard money loans are generally more expensive than conventional financing due to the lender’s increased risk. 

That’s why we offer more affordable, flexible, and outside-of-the-box lending solutions when a conventional loan is not an option.

metaDescription.html:
CoHi is a private money lender out of Denver, Colorado. 

They specialize in funding properties located along the Front Range, up the I-70 corridor and small ski mountain towns.

They have many specialized loan programs including for renovation, transactional and foreign national lending.

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Experienced fix and flippers who understand their borrowers

description.html:
We are a small family owned Denver based business driven to help other investors (we are not currently actively investing, to avoid any potential conflict of interest). 

We started a buy and rehab business over a decade ago, and understand the needs of our local borrowers.

We charge zero "junk fees".

We are one of the few Colorado lenders who will consider 2nd position loans (3 points/10%), we will lend up to 100% of purchase (with additional collateral) and 100% of rehab.

Our application takes less than 10 minutes, but we always recommend a phone call prior, and you will be speaking directly with a decision maker.

In house underwriting-appraisal or BPO rarely needed, and typically refunded to borrower at closing. 

We make our own loan decisions and typically make loan commitments in under 24 hours from receipt of requested information.

Call us, we'd love to hear what you are up to!

metaDescription.html:
Salt Funding is a family owned local hard money lender serving Colorado.

They provide competitive funding with a high LTV and no junk fees.

They are former fix and flippers so understand the situational needs of the their borrowers very well.

lenderProfiles.bestFeatures3: Ability to close quickly, in as little as a few days

description.html:
Marquee Funding Group, Inc. is a full service mortgage banking firm specializing in the origination, investment sale, and servicing of privately placed real estate loans more commonly known as hard money (private equity loans).

Marquee funds all types of loans in both the consumer and commercial marketplace by offering access to borrowers that cannot find a source of institutional financing. 

Marquee has the ability to arrange debt on all types of real property.

Our founders have been working together since 1994 and the dream of Marquee Funding Group came to a fruition in 2009.

Our firm is managed by experienced mortgage professionals dedicated to offering the highest quality products and services in the industry.

Marquee Funding Group is an experienced team of savvy real estate investors. 

We understand your urgency, as a broker, to get your customer’s deal done. If your mortgage transaction makes sense, we’ll do it fast and simple – funding in days, not months.

Unlike institutional lenders and underwriting, we are a private money lender. 

Our lending decisions are based on the merits of each deal and the benefit to your customer.

metaDescription.html:
Marquee Funding Group is a California hard money lender out of Calabasas. 

Marquee funds all types of loans in both the consumer and commercial marketplace including; single-family & multi-family residences, condos, mixed use, retail and office buildings across California and Colorado.

description.html:
Lead Funding’s mission is to offer non-bank direct lending to real estate investors with competitive rates, hassle-free and quick terms, and complimentary essential tools. 

This “holistic” approach assists small to large real estate investors and is truly industry unique. 

To date, Lead Funding has loaned in excess of $700,000,000 directly to investors and has experienced a high client retention rate. 

In fact, our clients often keep multiple loans and continually borrow for new acquisitions as they turn over their investment properties.

Lead Funding is an operating company with more than $80 Million of available capital. 

The company operates within Arizona, Colorado, Texas and Washington. 

We’re proud to be a direct lender that can underwrite and make decisions quickly to help you build a successful flipping or acquisition business. 

We understand how dynamic the investment real estate market is. 

That’s why our customer service is often described as “unparalleled.”  

We work with a sense of urgency — which is often required — so timely and informed decisions can be made quickly.

They have specialized loan products for new construction, refinances, acquisition and fix & flips.

description.html:
Wilshire Quinn, headquartered in San Diego, California, is a direct private money lender focused on short term bridge loans, secured by first trust deeds.

Bridge loans are a specific type of asset-based loan financing through which a borrower receives funds secured by real property. 

Wilshire Quinn’s successful track record is closely linked to our disciplined underwriting approach. 

Our emphasis on in-house loan origination allows for a faster, more streamlined lending process. 

Wilshire Quinn has grown to become one of the premier bridge lenders in California.

Since 2004, Wilshire Quinn Capital Inc. has been a leader in the capital markets. 

In 2011, the firm launched the Wilshire Quinn Income Fund LLC, a direct portfolio lender that originates bridge loans secured by real estate located primarily in California. 

Today Wilshire Quinn Capital serves as the Fund’s managing partner, actively working to provide fast, reliable funding for our borrowers and consistent returns for our investors.

Wilshire Quinn provides financing to borrowers who are unable to obtain credit from traditional lending institutions. 

Our customer base is fairly diverse; borrowers range from corporations looking for construction financing, to individuals who are looking to purchase or refinance an investment property.

metaDescription.html: Wilshire Quinn is a private money lender headquartered in San Diego, California. They have an long track record of succes based on their disciplined underwriting approach. They primarliy fund loans in California, but are also open to nationwide business.

description.html:
If you're a borrower who has had to look elsewhere because the lending market is too difficult to work with, then you've come to the right place!

We lend funds based on the equity you have in your real estate, and we fund quickly.

Borrowers rely on our transparent policies of private money lending or home loans.

When compared to our competitors, Rock Finance, Inc. will carefully consider and advise you on each loan opportunity.

We fund within 7 days and we use your equity as collateral. If you have equity — we will fund your deal! Regardless if you're the borrower or investor for private money loans, private financing, or private mortgage pool, we will make sure to optimize our services in accordance with your unique situation.

Indeed, loans are best handled on a case-by-case basis, so please free to contact us directly.

How much do we loan?

Rock Finance Inc. keeps the industry standard over $1,000,000 amounts in terms of brokered loans.

The first-time homebuyer composes most of the market. Most of our loans specifically range from $100,000 to $15,000,000 on average. It is our mission to look for long-term properties that will produce an attractive rental cash flow.

description.html:
Fast and honest private lending for your real estate investments, whether you’re an experienced investor or a first-time borrower.

Applying for a private money loan shouldn't be complicated, with Carlyle Capital, it's not.

Our loan officers can quickly determine the best loan structure for your scenario.

We’ll work with you to create a bespoke financing solution that suits your investment needs.

We’re a nationwide lender with a local approach.

We believe in providing exceptional service and aggressive financing that benefits real estate investors.

When you work with Carlyle Capital, you become a part of the family.

We understand time is of the essence, and typically issue a letter of intent same day, and work expeditiously to underwrite your file to close within two weeks.

Deal direct with decision makers, "When Your Bank Says No, We Say Yes"​.

description.html:
We have been funding loans in the private money space since 1986. We have assembled a great team of honest, ethical, and hard working employees here at Residential First Capital.

We offer many private as well as institutional loan products.

Our goal is always to procure the best financing package for each individuals needs.

We pride ourselves on our integrity, knowledge of the business, and relationships we have with our affiliates.

We have the ability to get very creative with our solutions and will always keep the borrowers interest first and foremost in every transaction.

If we can't help you, we will do our best to refer you to someone who can.

We are very responsive and look forward to seeking a solution to your financing needs.

Best Rates. Fast Closings. $150MM+ Funded in 2020. Fix-And-Flip & Rental Loans. SFRs, Multi-family.

Bridge or Fix & Flip

  • 80-90% of purchase (depends on experience and values)

Rental Loans

  • 80% of purchase

  • 30 Years Fixed
  • 1-2 Points

  • Portfolios OK!

Gauntlet Funding prides itself of being the go-to source for flexible customized loan solutions as our relationship gets stronger.

Because we are a balance sheet lender with top tier financial counterparties that invest in us we can offer both more flexible solutions and products appropriately priced for A and B tier borrowers.

We have been in your shoes and have fixed properties, rented them and have experienced the same challenges that you do.

We feel this experience helped us craft a better experience and product for our borrowers.

Come visit our page and give us a call or fill out our form to get started!

description.html:
Offering a better alternative to hard money, Navigator Private Capital (NavCap) has reimagined private real estate lending—making it accessible to real estate investors at all experience levels.

As private money lenders, we fund short- and long-term low-risk development projects nationwide. By extending asset backed real estate investor loans to renovation and rental experts, NavCap capitalizes on the inefficiencies and gaps in the commercial real estate lending industry, extending credit where and when it is needed most.

Much more than just a funding source, we are firmly committed to the long-term success of our borrowers and investors. We offer a strong value proposition to our clients, providing hands on support and guidance throughout the life of each project.

They have a variety of specialized loan programs including fix & flip, mulit-family, rental property, new construction and portfolio.

Commercial Partners of Texas is one of the top commercial mortgage lenders that provides a commercial real estate loan, equity and mezzanine debt for acquisition, refinance and construction nationwide.

We offer a broad range of conventional and a non-bank commercial real estate loans for small business owners, builders, developers and management firms. We have the most competitive commercial loan programs available to meet the needs of our clients.

Grand Coast Capital Group is a private real estate investment firm, started in 2013, with a proven track record of generating attractive risk-adjusted returns by originating loans, making equity investments, and successfully managing multiple private equity funds.

Led by a management team with over 50 years of real estate lending and investment experience, Grand Coast has built an institutional-quality platform with offices in Boston, Chicago & Dublin, Ireland.

We are a national lender that has successfully funded over 1,000 deals and hundreds of millions of dollars in volume. We can help borrowers scale their business and offers surety of close.

description.html:
Easy Street Capital is a relationship investment real estate lender with loan programs for every borrower.

Regardless of experience or credit we are able to finance your next investment property.

Whether you are buying a property to fix up, building new construction, or generating cash flow from rental units Easy Street Capital has the solution.

As a fully discretionary lender we have the ability to customize a loan specifically to meet your individual needs.

We look forward to assisting you with your next project.

Easy Street Capital is 100% committed to earning the borrower’s trust and confidence.

With no appraisal or credit requirement the terms of your loan will never change.

We underwrite your deal within 24 hours and the terms that we issue are the same terms we fund.

description.html:
At BorrowLabs, we strive to bring modern user experience – simple, transparent, straightforward, and goal-oriented – into hard money lending.

We want California real estate investors to cross out the cumbersome process of obtaining a loan from their list of headaches, making it instead just a tiny checkbox on their to-do list.

We collect as little paperwork as possible from our borrowers, pulling as much data as we can from our vendors and sourcing the rest directly from the escrow.

Whether you fix and flip, rent, or refinance, we’ve got you covered.

Our pricing is totally transparent – check it out online, it's free, and no sign-up needed.

Our service can’t be beaten, and we’re competitive on rates.

Reliable funding for your fix-and-flip projects. In a world where liquidity is scarce, Credeo Finance will help you to reach your goals.

You’re a real estate investor.

It’s time to get an investment property loan from a lender who specializes in it.

Credeo Finance originates, underwrites, and funds real estate investments (hard money, commercial, bridge, alternative loans) for real estate investors’ time-sensitive investment projects.

With our direct access to capital markets, we customize each real estate deal to fit the goals of investors and developers with competitive terms and rates.

description.html:
Rock East Funding is a veteran hard money lender for experienced real estate investors. We know that for investors, having access to money quickly makes all the difference. Because we are direct lenders, not brokers, we are able to make decisions and get to the closing table quickly. We have built our business on being ready to close when our clients are ready.

Completely family-owned, we have closed over 10,000 loans for our clients, aggregating more than $2 billion. Our team has more than 50 years of combined experience in residential “flips”, commercial bridge financing, and loans for rental properties. If you are an experienced real estate investor in need of financing for a 1-4 family home, apartment building, or commercial property, we can help.

Contact us today and let’s have a conversation about your goals and projects. Our business is helping you do business.

description.html:
ABOUT FINLEND CAPITAL®

FinLend Capital® is a nationwide, private direct lender. Established in 2018, we provide both short-term fix & flip financing and long-term rental financing for real estate investors. Our loans, often called Alt-A, Non-QM, and/or hard money loans, can be used for the purchase or refinance of non-owner occupied residential & commercial properties, financing of renovation projects, and bridge funding. FinLend Capital lends to real estate professionals, commercial contractors, developers & small business owners throughout the country.

- - -

FIX & FLIP LOANS

Short-term financing for the purchase & rehab of non-owner occupied properties.

- - -

RENTAL LOANS

Long-term financing for investors who are holding properties for rental income.

- - -

BRIDGE LOANS

Short-term financing for residential, commercial & mixed-use properties.

LOAN / MONEY AVAILABLE TO LEND AT ELMER BASHARAT INVESTMENT COMPANY.

The opportunity is here for you to get what you have been looking for, the development and growth of the economy depends on investment and all business/startup needs funding to expand. It is time to move forward and establish. Elmer Basharat investment company is out to help investors, enterpreneur, individuals and companies get the funding they need to establish. We invest on properties/business and also offer Start-up loans, Property/Business loans, Investment loans, Agricultural Loan, Rehab/Expansion loans, Personal loans, Educational Loans, Real estate loans, JV Capital/ Construction loans, Mobile home loan, Debt free loans, Equity/Refinance loans e.t.c to interested persons from any country with any credit rate. The services of brokers/investors  is also needed who can work with us on assisting persons who need financial help. Have you been turned down by banks or lenders, Elmer Basharat company is here to assist you archieve your goal. If you are interested in a loan or need investor, do contact us through this email address and we are here to help you get what you need.

elmerbashara@gmail.com

All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners in the United States and/or other countries. All company, product and service names used are for identification purposes only. The use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.

¹ Out-of-network ATM withdrawal fees apply except at MoneyPass® ATMs. Other fees, such as third-party fees, may apply. Withdrawing money from any out-of-network ATMs may result in a $2.50 ATM withdrawal fee per transaction, plus any additional fees the ATM operator may charge. MoneyPass® is a registered trademark of Fiserv, Inc.

² Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of the submission of the payment file from the payer. We generally make these funds available on the day the payment file is received, which may be up to 2 days earlier than the scheduled payment date.

Rates and Terms for Unsecured Loans: Loan amounts range from $2,000 to $35,000. APR ranges from 9.95% to 35.99%. Loan lengths range from 24 to 60 months. Administration fee up to 4.75%.

* These rates apply only to unsecured loans. The actual loan amount, term, and APR amount of loan that a customer qualifies for may vary based on credit determination and state law. Minimum loan amounts vary by state.

** These terms apply only to unsecured loans. Example: A $5,700 loan with an administration fee of 4.75% and an amount financed of $5,429.25, repayable in 36 monthly installments, would have an APR of 29.95% and monthly payments of $230.33.

‡ This applies only to unsecured loans. Funds are generally deposited via ACH for delivery next business day after approval if approved by 4:30pm CT Monday-Friday.

We offer a variety of business loan and real estate financing solutions to borrowers nationwide.

We provide financing in all 50 states regardless of credit score. If you have $30,000+ a month in revenue, you qualify.

Elite Financial Mortgage, Inc offers business owners alternative working capital solutions through our various funding programs for business loans.

Whether you’ve been in business for decades or are just starting, Elite Financial Mortgage, Inc can provide you with the funding you need.

I offer all types of legitimate/investment funding such as fix & flip, buy & hold, equity loans, real estate loans, business loans, personal loans, debt consolidation loans.

proper understanding of the person you're about to work with and how

our program works. My name is and i am the loan officer that work for Loan Funder LLC Company located in 318 N CARSON CITY NV. I

offer all kind of loans in the amount of $10,000 to $10,000,000 Max with a repayment duration of 3 months to 7 years

I am diligently seeking borrowers with viable projects who are experiencing difficulty in obtaining financing via conventional channels. If your business is organized and needs capital, I can provide a business or personal loans for your projects (Start-up loans, Property/Business loans, Investment loans, Rehab/Expansion loans, Personal loans, Educational Loans, Real estate loans, Fix/flips loan, Construction loans, Mobile home loan, Debt free loans, Equity/Refinance loans etc.

If Interested please do get back to me for more detailed information.

description.html:
We are direct lenders and brokers, lending our own funds as well as private investor funds to help clients realize their dreams of ownership. We specialize in hard to approve files, clients with financial issues, and files have been turned down by other lenders. We fund business start ups, real estate and personal projects . If we can’t do it, most likely nobody else will.

We do not run a credit check on your credit profile because we know each time its done you lose points, rather we focus on your monthly income as well as your employment status. We will be glad to make your dreams come true.

description.html:
Hello Investor/Borrower/Buyer/Wholesaler, we are Southeast Private Lending, LLC and I am Atlanta, GA's only Premier "OLD SCHOOL" True Hard Money Local Real Estate Lender located here in Cobb County/Marietta since 2008 (15+ Years) funding investors in the entire Metro Atlanta Area and GA Statewide for all property types to Purchase, Cashout, Refinance, Renovate/Rehab, Purch & Rehab (Fix-N-Flip), Construction Completion (not ground up- 60%+ buildout), Transactional Funding for Wholesalers and "Same Day Sales" (Leg A to B Only), We even do a "Primary Residence Hard Money Specialty Loan" (Refinance or Cashout only-NO PURCH, loan made to LLC"!) We lend on Land Deals/Lots/Tracts/parcels Too!

Georgia only No Doc Loans (Income/Employment Not Verified)! Absolutely NO UPFRONT FEES! No Credit Report Pull or FICO Score Required! (WOW)- No Appraisal (we visit & inspect the property ourselves) and you save $600+!! (No-Brainer) No Prepayment Penalties-No Upfront Fee w/Same Day Approvals + Proof of Funds Letters for Purchase Contracts & our Signature 7 Day Closings!

65% True Hard Equity Lending on "as is FMV" (Cashout/Refinance/Rehab-Renovation). 20% cash down for Fix-N-Flips (Purch/Rehab)= 80% LTC on Acquisitions w/Rehab. 100% Transactional Funding for Wholesalers/Same-Day Sales (Leg A to B)! Rates from 12%+. Terms from 1-3Year Notes- WOW! (Not 6 months like the other local "Wimps"). We even lend to Owner Occupied (Primary Residence) homes for refinance/cashout closing only under an "LLC name" up to 65% (NOBODY DOES THAT BUT US!). Land/Lots 50-60% Loan (40-50% down). Top registered GA State Lender 2008-2023! Look us up on GA SOS site (most of these other Lender pretender lenders on FB are just plain scared to really tell you who and where the hell they are!). No Red Tape- Straight Talk only! We are fully capitalized and ready to fund your next deal! "Show me the deal and we'll show you the money"! If you don't have any cash (money) to put down on purchase deals don't call us! No 20% down Cash= No Deal (no time for dreamers/deadbeats/pretenders/wannabees/knuckleheads or hotel room seminar graduates)! (most of the people in all of these groups on FB have no capital, no real savings of their own, or experience, and just want to dump off properties they don't even own for a commission to unsuspecting buyers). BUYER BEWARE!!!

Remember, we are here & local (Cobb County), why waste time being scammed by other out of state lenders who don't make direct loans here in the local GA market, or people with fictitious/masked/forwarding phone #'s from free texting APPS and profiles and ask for money upfront, etc...(believe me there is no 5% rate or 90-100% funding for you with them). Most of these Gimmicks are from out of country trollers (mostly Africa/Eastern Europe).

Call, Email, "PM" or Text 404-259-9416 Now & Let's Get Your Deal Closed in 7 Days! (free advice & counsel, or "just to talk")!! Brokers/Agents/Consultants Protected! WE PAY BROKERS FOR YOUR REFERRALS THAT CLOSE!!!

Facebook Message Me Now! (messenger): m.me/SoutheastPrivateLending

EmojiEmoji

Allan Znoj

Atlanta Direct Funding Principal

description.html: Here's a little insight on my parameters. My name is Dominic Aungles. I have been an active PML (private money lender) more than 7 years now. I am currently doing business as capital property group llc here in las Vegas. I must say i apply a rather more direct approach with borrowers , that helps to save time and hassle of conventional channels with less paperwork. I am also not limited to real estate deals, I'm mostly flexible to consider any project presented to me. I can do 100 % financing for up to $25M, with max term of 15 years in as much as i prefer short term deals. I know time is always a huge factor so i do my best always to meet up even before closing dates. I am active and capable to deal whenever a solid deal is presented to me. You can request for our website for more information
